name: Sandstream Development
tagline: We make it worth to invest in software development
description:
We are…
the Internet technology solutions company specialising in Enterprise Internet Applications and consultancy services for the customers all over the world. Our international experience allows us to work as a partner, instead of yet another outsourcing company. We are passionate about delivering innovative Internet solutions.
Polish branch…
of Sandstream was founded in 2016 due to the needs of the European market. We are sharing across the world the same values of using only proven technologies and cost-effective infrastructure solutions. We strongly believe that happy customer is the one who brings us another customer. Therefore, we collaborate closely with our clients and bring them the most valuable solutions.
Our infrastructure…
solutions correspond to both large companies and small start-ups. Well-equipped office, proven server solutions and fluency in cloud based technologies allow us to implement projects transparently to customers, while keeping very high level of security.
Cost-effective…
solutions could be used with respect to quality and security. Our experience allows us to share with our customers ideas that are not expensive but very sustainable
